about_the_game:
Opening/Ending Theme EP for Corona Blossom.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.


1. Happy! Corona Blossom
Vocal: Haruko Momoi
Lyrics&Music: Haruko Momoi
Arrangement: Toshinori Orikura

2. Be Myself
Vocal: Ayumi.(Astilbe x arendsii)
Lyrics: Ayumi.(Astilbe x arendsii)
Music: Toshinori Orikura


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
